channel.title: Personal on Carter Salz
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Carter Salz

item.title: 455 Days
item.description: 455 days ago today I started work at a fairly large medical software company in Madison, Wisconsin. About 3 weeks in I realized I didn’t want to be there1 very long. This is something I did in high school. It took me awhile to figure out - and it doesn’t even work right yet - but hey it’s mine. I wrote it; that’s what this is supposed to be all about.
